title: [Large-Scale] Modified Jigsaw-Based Inquiry Course in Fundamental Physics

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of high school-level physics concepts
context.additional_context: Learners collect and analyze field experiment data using personal devices, conducting projects that connect natural phenomena with theoretical concepts

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more physics laws (e.g., Newtonâ€™s laws of motion, law of conservation of energy) with experimental data through modified jigsaw collaboration.
Learners can present two observational cases applying physics concepts from daily life and natural phenomena in project report format.
Learners can identify three or more experimental design errors and propose improvements through peer assessment.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
